com.github.nsc.de.compiler.lexer.characterinputstream

Class StringCharacterInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nsc.de.compiler.lexer.characterinputstream.StringCharacterInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterInputStream

    public class StringCharacterInputStream
extends Object
implements CharacterInputStream
    An implementation of CharacterInputStream using just a string as argument
    Author:
    Nicolas Schmidt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringCharacterInputStream(String source, String content)
      Constructor for StringCharacterInputStream with default position (starting from the start)
      StringCharacterInputStream(String source, String content, Position position)
      Constructor for StringCharacterInputStream with given position

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      char actual()
      Returns the actual character (the same as returned by next() when used before)

      Returns the chars of the CharacterInputStream

      Returns the actual position of the CharacterInputStream

      Returns the source (mostly file) of the CharacterInputStream

      Checks if the CharacterInputStream has a given number of characters left

      Checks if the CharacterInputStream has a next character left

      Gives back the next character without skipping

      Gives back the next character without skipping
